titleStmt.title: The Character of a quack-astrologer, or, The spurious prognosticator anatomiz'd
titleStmt.author: J. S.
Ramesey, William, 1627-1675 or 6.

notesStmt.note: Wing enters the title under J.S.
Attributed to William Ramesay--Cf. Greenbough, A bibliography of the Theophrastan character, 1947, p. 105.
"The spurious prognosticator" is John Gadbury--Cf. British Museum catalogue.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
